page.title: 17THE CHANDLER MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: We are a {Church of England Middle {School. }There are {13 teachers}and{4 {helpers.}Two of the Governors at present are the Reverend J. Harris and the Reverend I. Fenton.Our school uniform is red white and grey.There are {260}children in the school,but next year there will be 270.The subjects we do are : Maths, English, Science, French, R.E. Topic, Art,P.E. Music,CDT and Home Economics.There are 30 rooms in the school.The school is 10 years old.{Mrs Entwistle }the head teacher,came in September 1984.She enjoys her job.She likes the friendly children best.If she did not work as a teacher she would like to do other work with children.The thing she does not like about the school is that it has not been decorated inside for at least 10 years.
